itemDescription: Scottish episcopal clergyman and Dean of Glasgow and Galloway (1920–1989)

wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Stanfield Singer (1920 – 13 November 1989) was a Scottish episcopal clergyman who was Dean of Glasgow and Galloway from 1974 to 1987.

response: Singer Lake has the name of Samuel Singer, a pioneer who settled at the lake in 1836.
